root.name: Garry Kitchen's Super Battletank: War in the Gulf
root.description: Gameplay Based on the real life "Operation Desert Storm", you control an M1 Abrams tank as part of the United Nations forces. The game takes place from the first person perspective.Â Re-Release and alternate title The game saw a 2003 re-relase on the Game Boy Advance under the name Operation: Armored Liberty. On the Sega Genesis and Super NES the title is Garry Kitchen's Super Battletank: War in the Gulf, but on the Game Gear the title is simply Super Battletank.
